Uses of Package
de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.linkage

  • Packages that use de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.linkage 
    Package Description
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical
    Hierarchical agglomerative clustering (HAC).
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.linkage
    Linkages for hierarchical clustering.
  • Classes in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.linkage used by de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical 
    Class and Description
    Linkage
    Abstract interface for implementing a new linkage method into hierarchical clustering.
  • Classes in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.linkage used by de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.linkage 
    Class and Description
    CentroidLinkage
    Centroid linkage — Unweighted Pair-Group Method using Centroids (UPGMC).
    CompleteLinkage
    Complete-linkage ("maximum linkage") clustering method.
    FlexibleBetaLinkage
    Flexible-beta linkage as proposed by Lance and Williams.
    GroupAverageLinkage
    Group-average linkage clustering method (UPGMA).
    Linkage
    Abstract interface for implementing a new linkage method into hierarchical clustering.
    MedianLinkage
    Median-linkage — weighted pair group method using centroids (WPGMC).
    MinimumVarianceLinkage
    Minimum increase in variance (MIVAR) linkage.
    SingleLinkage
    Single-linkage ("minimum") clustering method.
    WardLinkage
    Ward's method clustering method.
    WeightedAverageLinkage
    Weighted average linkage clustering method (WPGMA).
